content: > please also note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > https //keepcalmandcrochetonuk com/2021/10/08/free-crochet-pattern-slick-and-quick-pumpkin-trio/ this > downloadable pdf file for sale > contains the full pattern without > advertisements create some cozy autumn vibes with a quick and easy pumpkin trio perfect for autumnal table settings around the mantle or for a welcoming doorway - after all what s october without a few pumpkins made from aran / worsted weight yarn and a 5mm hook they are a perfect pattern for any beginner crocheters as they only use simple stitches who might be looking for an autumnal project they are also incredibly satisfying and sort of addictive to make i already want to create a whole pumpkin patch **hook ** us size h/8 5 mm **notions ** scissors a yarn needle toy stuffing **yarn required ** 10ply / yarn weight #4 worsted stylecraft special aran used in photographs e g 1 ball spice shade 1711 yarn a 1 ball camel shade 1420 yarn b 1 ball pistachio shade 1822 yarn c 1 ball dark brown shade 1004 yarn d about the yarn 8ply / aran / worsted weight 196m per 100g ball 100% acrylic **finished sizes ** * large pumpkin approx 15cm 5 9 high / 52 cm 20 circumference * medium pumpkin approx 12cm 4 7 high / 44cm 17 7 circumference * small pumpkin approx 10cm 3 9 high / 35cm 13 7 circumference **gauge ** 5dc= 1 4 inches / 3 5cm **skill level ** easy if you like this pattern then please come check out my other designs www ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs this pattern is c designed by heather gibbs 2021 and is for personal use only not for resale patterns are not to be copied sold or distributed however you are welcome to donate gift as well as sell any of your finished items if you are an individual crafter if you sell your work online please credit the work as appropriate and link to my pages where you can thank you http //keepcalmandcrochetonuk com http //facebook com/keepcalmandcrochetonuk https //www instagram com/kcaco uk/ http //ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs https //tinyurl com/kcacouk-lovecrafts-com http //pinterest com/kcacouk/ http //twitter com/kcacouk
